overview.en: Super Ticket Coin (STKC) is dedicated to the development and application of blockchains. Relying on Ethereum smart contracts and other features, it focuses on building a new financial consumption system and creating a point conversion ecosystem  to  serve  the  users  around  the  world.  It  aims  to  become  the  starting  point and daily essential tools for users’ exploration of blockchains, thereby allowing the landing of the business mode of blockchains with great  efforts.
overview.zh: Super Ticket Coin（STKC）致力於區塊鏈開發應用，利用以太坊智能合約等特性，專注於構建新的金融消費系統，打造積分轉換生態圈，服務於全球用戶，使用戶成為探索區塊鏈的起點和日常必備工具，以極大的力度實現區塊鏈商業模式的應用落地。
